channel.title: I can't connect to the server!
channel.description:
i'm getting this error message every time.
"Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?"
Also it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancel" then "start server" to make your own".
I have tried doing that and it doesn't work.
What do you make of it? Some1 tell me what i can do!
thanks.

item.title: I can't connect to the server!
item.dc:creator: @andrewdawg andrewdawg
item.description:
@andrewdawg wrote:

the error on port one- means you have moparscape running so u cant compile or u have the runserver running or a compile that u havnt shut down.

and if you are trying to connect to your own server then u double click run server and then type username n pass. or if u r connecting 2 another server it is because server isnt running

hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: I can't connect to the server!
